 --------- ---------- ------------ ----------- --------------- 
 [32m Name    [39m [32m Method   [39m [32m Scheme     [39m [32m Host      [39m [32m Path          [39m 
 --------- ---------- ------------ ----------- --------------- 
  route_1   GET|HEAD   http|https   localhost   /hello/{name}  
  route_2   PUT|POST   http|https   localhost   /name/add      
 --------- ---------- ------------ ----------- ---------------
